medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced abdominal pain that started in the right lower quadrant (RLQ) and generalized to the left lower quadrant (LLQ) and supraumbilical region over a duration of several days. The patient also reported 3 episodes of non-bilious non-bloody emesis 2 days ago.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Asthma as a child, gunshot wound and open reduction internal fixation (ORIF) of right elbow, skin graft, right brachial artery interposition graft with native saphenous vein, re-exploration of brachial artery graft, ORIF of right ulna.
